com.austinv11.collectiveframework.minecraft.utils

Class StructureCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.austinv11.collectiveframework.minecraft.utils.StructureCreator

  • public class StructureCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility to aid in creating world gen structures

      • addBlock

        public void addBlock(Location location,
            net.minecraft.block.Block block,
            int meta)
        Adds a block to the structure with the default implementation of StructureCreator.ICheckBlockValidity
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the block
        block - The block
        meta - The meta for the block

      • addBlock

        public void addBlock(Location location,
            net.minecraft.block.Block block,
            int meta,
            StructureCreator.ICheckBlockValidity validityChecker)
        Adds a block to the structure with a custom implementation of StructureCreator.ICheckBlockValidity
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the block
        block - The block
        meta - The meta for the block
        validityChecker - The StructureCreator.ICheckBlockValidity to use

      • isStructureValid

        public boolean isStructureValid()
        Checks if the structure is valid for spawning
        Returns:
        True if the structure can be generated, false if otherwise

      • generateStructure

        public void generateStructure()
        Generates the structure, it won't generate if isStructureValid() is false

      • generateStructure

        public void generateStructure(boolean forceOptionalBlocks)
        Generates the structure with the set flags, it won't generate if isStructureValid() is false
        Parameters:
        forceOptionalBlocks - If true, blocks which don't need to be generated for the structure to spawn will spawn

      • generateStructure

        public void generateStructure(boolean forceOptionalBlocks,
                     boolean forceNonOptionalBlocks)
        Generates the structure with the set flags
        Parameters:
        forceOptionalBlocks - If true, blocks which don't need to be generated for the structure to spawn will spawn
        forceNonOptionalBlocks - If true, the structure will generate regardless of the results of isStructureValid()
